title: How to Win Lane?
body:
Kennen was free this week so I decided to play him. I found out I really enjoy playing him, however I find that I cannot win my lanes.

I'll play against Darius or Fiora nd then they just instantly out trade me even if I've used my 4th Hit, W and Q.
I'd like to just know what I'm doing because guides and such say it's easy to win lane VS a melee, but they jut don't give a shit.

replies.body:
Just farm really safely, Kennen has very low base health and can often get poked and bullied around depending on the enemy.
Stand behind your ranged minions and go for the melee minions.
Also punish the enemy if they get too close or their out of position.
In short, just farm and be passive

You can either wait until their skills are on CD, just poke with shurikens, or go even in lane and win team fights with the ult. He probably just won't win trades vs them, they're probably just stronger than him in lane.
